Sentencas: Fuel cell systems, especially those fed with hydrogen, have reached considerable performance targets in laboratory conditions with constant loads and conservative environmental conditions.
Titulo: Demonstration and development of a polymer electrolyte fuel cell system for residential use

Sentencas: However, a check of the potential of such systems in real conditions is necessary, particularly in terms of varying electrical and thermal loads and of more severe climatic conditions.
Titulo: Demonstration and development of a polymer electrolyte fuel cell system for residential use

Sentencas: To determine the state of the art of such technology and to develop systems capable of supporting future national energy scenarios within the PNR-FISR project, Polymeric electrolytes and ceramic fuel cells: demonstration of systems and development of new materials, the development of fuel cell systems ranging from 1 to 5 kW of power and based on either solid polymer (PEMFC) or solid oxide (SOFC) technology are in progress.
Titulo: Demonstration and development of a polymer electrolyte fuel cell system for residential use

Sentencas: in this paper, the demonstration of a pre-commercial PEMFC system fed with hydrogen and developed in cooperation with NUVERA is described.
Titulo: Demonstration and development of a polymer electrolyte fuel cell system for residential use

Sentencas: The system has been developed in order to determine its limits and capacity in relation to start-up time, response time, consumption, efficiency, reliability, etc.
Titulo: Demonstration and development of a polymer electrolyte fuel cell system for residential use

Sentencas: It has currently reached 1000 working hours of continuous performance with variable loads that simulate those of a typical residential dwelling.
Titulo: Demonstration and development of a polymer electrolyte fuel cell system for residential use
